articles.title: Men use men's soap; Wild Stone pushes gendered rules
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Wild Stone's latest commercial for its soaps features a narrative that attempts to reassert traditional gender roles. The advertisement suggests men should use men's soap, implying that using soap marketed to women is unmanly. This approach is similar to Emami's Fair and Handsome campaign from over a decade ago.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Reports Q4 and Fiscal 2025 Results; Expands Partnerships, Delivers Repeat Orders, and Maintains Strong Financial Position
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Nexe Innovations is focused on product development and expansion, anticipating customer demand. The company expects to launch new SKUs and form strategic partnerships to grow its market presence in Canada and the U.S. Nexe Innovations is scaling operations and executing its business strategy.

articles.title: LinkedIn Adds More Ad Automation Options for SMBs
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: LinkedIn has introduced new AI-powered tools to streamline ad campaign creation for SMBs. These tools include enhanced auto-targeting, which requires fewer inputs to reach the ideal audience; AI-generated ad variations based on previous content; and an 'Recommendations' tab that provides data-driven suggestions for improved ad performance and ROI.

articles.title: You can now buy things through ChatGPT with new "Checkout" tool
articles.author: Megan  Cerullo
articles.summary: OpenAI launched the "Instant Checkout" feature in ChatGPT, enabling users to purchase products directly within the chat. Through partnerships with Etsy and soon Shopify, this feature provides access to numerous vendors like Glossier, SKIMS, and Steve Madden. This new service allows ChatGPT to act as a shopper's agent, streamlining the buying process for consumers and offering merchants a new sales channel.

articles.title: OpenAI Partners With Shopify for Shopping Without Exiting the Chatbot
articles.author: David Moin
articles.summary: OpenAI and Shopify have launched "Instant Checkout," enabling purchases within the ChatGPT chatbot. ChatGPT users can also now buy directly from U.S. Etsy sellers in chat.  Shopify merchants, including brands like Glossier, Spanx, and Steve Madden, will be among the first to use the service.

articles.title: Chipotle Bets on New Red Chimichurri Sauce to Attract Gen Z Diners
articles.author: NBC Palm Springs
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new sauce called Red Chimichurri. This sauce will be featured on a limited-time menu at Chipotle restaurants, targeting Gen Z diners. The introduction of the sauce aims to contribute to Chipotle's sales rebound.

articles.title: AI-powered agency offers marketers a measurable return on insight
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: Neon octopus, a new technology-led consumer insights agency, has launched, offering services that combine AI with human ingenuity. A key offering is its use of synthetic data to explore markets and predictive analytics to optimize marketing spend, providing clients with a measurable return on insight.

articles.title: Viomi Celebrates 7th Nasdaq Anniversary with New Brand Campaign and U.S. Launch of AI Alkaline Mineral Water Purifier, MASTER M1
articles.author: Viomi Technology Co.
articles.summary: Viomi Technology Co., Ltd. has launched its MASTER M1 AI alkaline mineral water purifier on Amazon U.S. The purifier features a 9-stage RO filtration system, AI-powered smart faucet, and provides mineral-rich alkaline water. This launch signifies Viomi's expansion into the U.S. market and commitment to providing advanced water purification solutions.

articles.title: TOKYOPOP LAUNCHES BRANDED MERCHANDISE FOR TOP ANIME, MANGA AND MAHWA PROPERTIES
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: TOKYOPOP is launching a new line of branded merchandise, including advent calendars, SD figurines, playing cards, and tote bags, based on anime and manga properties like Attack on Titan, Dr. Stone, and Fairy Tail. The products are available from leading retailers and directly from the TOKYOPOP website, with specific release dates in October and December 2025 for different items.

articles.title: Bookmark This Page: We're Predicting Some of the Top Amazon October Prime Day Deals
articles.author: Emma Stessman
articles.summary: Amazon is expected to heavily discount its devices during Prime Big Deal Days, including the Fire TV Stick, which is already nearly 50% off. There will be opportunities to stock up on items like Celsius energy drinks, KitchenAid essentials, and portable chargers. Apple's AirPods are also expected to be discounted, and Google's Nest might also be on sale.

articles.title: OpenAI to let users buy from Shopify, Etsy stores with ChatGPT
articles.author: Murad Hemmadi
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched the Etsy link within its AI tool and will soon add Shopify merchants, allowing ChatGPT users to see products listed on Shopify's online Shop platform. Additionally, OpenAI is launching a new payment method co-developed with Stripe: Agentic Commerce Protocol, to facilitate AI agent-driven purchases.

articles.title: Wake up and smell the bacon: hotels' weirdest gimmicks
articles.author: Sarah Falson
articles.summary: Holiday Inn Express is launching a "Breakfast Alarm Clock" that emits the smell of breakfast in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Thailand, and Osaka, Japan for a limited time starting in October. This marketing gimmick aims to enhance the guest experience, nodding to the free buffet breakfast offered and leveraging research indicating pleasant smells can improve mood.

articles.title: Novi AI Launches New Web V2.1.0: Video Creation Made Accessible for Everyone
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: iMyFone's Novi AI launched Web V2.1.0, an update to their AI-powered video creation platform, making it accessible online. The new version includes AI-powered story, image, and text-to-video creation, multi-model support, and HD rendering. The platform now supports mobile browsers, allowing creators to start projects on smartphones and tablets.

articles.title: Skanteq Launches Affordable, No-App, Code-Free AR Platform for Businesses and Marketers
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Skanteq has launched its no-app, no-code augmented reality (AR) platform, designed to help marketers deliver immersive customer experiences without technical or financial barriers. The browser-based platform enables businesses to transform physical touch points into interactive digital experiences accessible via QR code, without the need for app downloads or coding.

articles.title: Shopify, OpenAI partner to allow merchants to sell through ChatGPT
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Shopify Inc. is enabling its software users to sell products via conversations within ChatGPT. This integration introduces a new sales channel for Shopify merchants.

articles.title: OpenAI takes on Google, Amazon with new agentic shopping system
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Instant Checkout' for ChatGPT users in the U.S., enabling in-chat purchases from Etsy and soon from Shopify merchants.  Additionally, OpenAI is open-sourcing its Agentic Commerce Protocol (ACP), developed with Stripe, to facilitate wider integration of AI-powered checkouts for other merchants and developers. Stripe is supporting this AI commerce by re-architecting commerce systems and creating new AI-powered experiences.

articles.title: Hayati New York
articles.author: Harry Ambrose
articles.summary: Hayati perfumes introduced Hayati New York, a new citrus-forward fragrance designed for modern femininity. This fragrance blends citrus notes with Oud and oriental perfume elements, drawing inspiration from the spirit of New York City. It aims to offer a luxurious and sophisticated experience for women.

articles.title: Novi AI Unleashes Web V2.1.0: Democratizing AI Video Creation for the Masses
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Novi AI launched its new Web V2.1.0 platform, a transformative update for digital content creation. This moves Novi AI's powerful video.

articles.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5 could be your next breakthrough coding tool - how to access it today
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Anthropic has updated its Claude Code offering.

articles.title: Silvie's unveils AI agent to transform retail efficiency in Guyana
articles.author: INEWS
articles.summary: Silvie's Industrial Solutions has launched Silvie AI, an AI-powered product selection agent that allows customers to quickly find industrial items. The AI agent is multilingual, available 24/7, and provides managers with insights into customer demand patterns, enhancing customer service and operational efficiency.

articles.title: Walls can hear, see, speak, walk
articles.author: Our Take
articles.summary: Samsung demonstrated its AI-powered home appliances at an event in Mumbai, showcasing how Galaxy AI, Vision AI, and Bespoke AI converge through the SmartThings platform. The new technology enables control of devices, learns household routines, and optimizes usage for appliances like refrigerators and ACs, offering insights and alerts based on user behavior.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Sand Storm edition's first look reveals next flagship design, launch "soon"
articles.author: Sami Khan
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced its next flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15 Sand Storm edition, featuring a design inspired by desert landscapes and aerospace-grade Micro-Arc Oxidation (MAO) technology. The device will run on Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 platform and feature a next-generation cooling system, along with a lightweight fibre-glass back.

articles.title: Shopify partners with OpenAI to let merchants sell products via ChatGPT
articles.author: Irene Galea
articles.summary: Shopify and Etsy merchants will soon be able to sell products directly to ChatGPT users via the new Instant Checkout feature. This feature, developed in partnership with OpenAI and utilizing Stripe's technology, allows users to purchase items directly within the ChatGPT app, marking a significant shift in online monetization. The feature will initially roll out to U.S.-based ChatGPT users buying from U.S. Etsy pages, with future access to over one million Shopify merchants.

articles.title: Shake to Elevate Expands Flavor-Forward Lineup with Two New Salt Free Dry Rubs
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Shake to Elevate has launched two new dry rub flavors: Smokey Sunrise Dry Rub and Red Rebellion Dry Rub. Smokey Sunrise offers a smoky flavor suitable for pork, chicken, and roasted vegetables, while Red Rebellion provides a spicy kick ideal for beef, tofu, and chili. Both products are available on the company website and focus on clean ingredients without excessive salt or fillers.

articles.title: Pour Moi nightwear review: Christmas pyjamas, satin chemise and cosy AW25 collection
articles.author: Julie Bayley
articles.summary: Pour Moi is launching its AW25 nightwear range featuring items from PJs to satin chemises. Simple is introducing its Wall Pilates challenge, a personalized 28-day Pilates workout plan. SmilePro is promoting its Advanced Whitening Kit, an at-home teeth whitening solution.

articles.title: "I gagged": Customers share honest reactions to the taste of Starbucks protein drinks
articles.author: Rebekah Harding
articles.summary: Starbucks launched new protein add-ons, including 'protein cold foam' and 'protein-boosted milk,' to their beverages on September 29th. The add-ons contain 15-36 grams of whey protein. Customer reviews are mixed, with some disliking the taste and others finding it acceptable.

articles.title: Amazon fall hardware event live blog: Latest updates on Alexa, Fire TV, Echo, and more
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Amazon is anticipated to unveil new products at its Devices and Services event this week. Expected announcements include new Echo speakers, Fire TVs, and a potential color version of the Kindle Scribe.

articles.title: How Filterbaby Built An 8 Figure Beauty Wellness Empire In 2 Years
articles.author: Yola Robert
articles.summary: Filterbaby launched the Pro Series Inline Shower Filter and the Filterbaby Shower Head Pro in Q4 2024. The Filterbaby Shower Head Pro was recognized as one of Time's Best Inventions of 2024. The brand is also preparing for a nationwide Target launch on October 12, 2025.

articles.title: Samsung Makes New Free $304 AI Offer To Galaxy Buyers
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung is offering several promotions for its Galaxy Tab S11 series. These promotions include a free 12-month subscription to Google AI Pro for students, bundled Galaxy Buds3 and a free keyboard cover in the U.K., and trade-in programs of up to £200 for any smartphone or tablet in any condition. U.S. buyers get one free year of Goodnotes, a 30-day pass to LumaFusion and a $100 Robux code for Roblox.

articles.title: Consumer Reports: Save money in the laundry room
articles.author: Consumer Reports
articles.summary: Consumer Reports' tests show that the LG Washer & LG DLEX4000W Dryer achieve top efficiency scores. The article also recommends using high-performing detergents like Tide Plus Ultra Stain Release or Costco's Kirkland Signature detergent, and skipping fabric softener and dryer sheets.

articles.title: Dallas Founder Bakes Up a New Playbook for Startups—With AI as the Main Ingredient » Dallas Innovates
articles.author: Dallas Innovates
articles.summary: StartStak.ai launched StartStak Academy on September 18, which is streaming education content. StartStak.ai plans to roll out The Lighthouse Experience later this year, which is a cognitive AI-native application supporting detailed business planning.

articles.title: Novi AI Launches New Web V2.1.0: AI Video Creation Made Accessible for Everyone
articles.author: i My Fone
articles.summary: iMyFone's Novi AI launched Web V2.1.0, expanding its AI-powered video creation platform online, which is accessible across devices without downloads. The update supports mobile browsers, allowing users to start projects on smartphones and tablets.

articles.title: Agilent Introduces the Altura Line of Inert HPLC Columns for Superior Results in Biotherapeutic Testing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Agilent Technologies Inc. has released a new range of high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) columns.

articles.title: This K-beauty cleanser is A+ for sensitive skin and on sale pre-Prime Day
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: Sulwhasoo Gentle Cleansing Oil, a K-beauty product, is currently on sale at 15% off on Amazon ahead of Prime Day. The product is highlighted for effectively removing makeup and grime without causing irritation, making it suitable for sensitive skin. It contains Korean herbal oils and is designed to leave the skin clear and comfortable.

articles.title: Swish: Seed Funding Raised For CPG Product Sampling Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Swish has launched a new programmatic product trials service that provides full-sized, in-stock consumer packaged goods as samples to consumers through their routine grocery shopping experiences. This service uses an AI platform to precisely determine product relevancy and integrate free products into first-party grocery orders. Pilot programs with retailers like Stater Brothers have demonstrated the model's ability to drive incremental penetration, enhance product velocity, and increase customer lifetime value.

articles.title: New Balance's Viral Sneaker Loafers Are Now Even Wilder Than Before
articles.author: Tres Dean
articles.summary: Ganni and New Balance are launching the Ganni x New Balance 1906L, a sneaker loafer featuring a snakeskin pattern with black, silver, and gold detailing. The shoe releases globally on September 30 for $190.

articles.title: Why ManyChat is the No-Code AI Engine for Social Commerce Growth in 2025
articles.author: The Daily Blog
articles.summary: ManyChat, a no-code AI platform, offers features like a visual Flow Builder, quick automations, and multi-platform integration to automate social commerce. These features enable businesses to automate customer conversations, scale personalized experiences, and grow email and SMS subscriber lists through conversational contact collection. ManyChat provides tools to enhance customer support automation with AI-powered FAQ flows, analyze campaign performance, and manage multi-channel campaigns effectively.

articles.title: The Secret Behind SharkNinja's Unstoppable Innovation
articles.author: Dave Knox
articles.summary: SharkNinja has launched the Fireside360, an outdoor heating solution designed to provide a 360-degree "warm blanket" effect, addressing the issues of smoky traditional fire pits and uneven heat distribution from floor heaters. The new product features a flame for ambience and is easily movable. Initial feedback on social media has been positive.

articles.title: iMini AI Agent Announces Major Upgrade: The Leading All-in-One AI Agent Integrates Tongyi Wan 2.2 and Seedream 4.0
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: iMini AI Agent launched a significant upgrade to its AI agent platform, integrating Tongyi Wan 2.2 and Seedream 4.0. This update enhances video and image creation capabilities, featuring models like Nano Banana 3.0 and DALL·E 3.5. iMini AI Agent is now available in North America, Europe, and Southeast Asia.

articles.title: Brave updates its AI-powered search with a detailed answers feature
articles.author: Tech Crunch
articles.summary: Brave, a browser maker and Google Search rival, has upgraded its AI-powered search suite, Ask Brave. The update delivers detailed answers, enriched with links, videos, news, and product information, alongside the existing AI Answers feature.

articles.title: Spirit Halloween unveils Scrub Daddy costumes
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Spirit Halloween is launching Scrub Daddy and Scrub Mommy costumes online as part of a collaboration with Scrub Daddy. The collection, inspired by Scrub Daddy's success, is exclusively available on Spirit Halloween's website. This launch allows fans to embody their love for the brand during the Halloween season.

articles.title: Robot sweeper and mopper drops to £45 with 77% discount
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Wowcher has launched a deal on a robot vacuum, offering a significant discount. Other companies like Eufy and Roborock are also offering discounted prices on their robot vacuum models, including self-emptying variants. These deals make robot vacuum cleaners more affordable for consumers.

articles.title: జీఎస్టీ తగ్గింపు.. ఏపీలో సూపర్ జీఎస్టీ-సూపర్ సేవింగ్స్, కేబినెట్ సబ్‌కమిటీతో సీఎం చంద్రబాబు సమావేశం
articles.summary: The Andhra Pradesh government launched 'Super GST Super Savings' program. The program is in response to changes in the Goods and Services Tax.

articles.title: YouTube launches Premium Lite in India: Check price, features, more details; here's what viewers get
articles.author: DNA
articles.summary: YouTube has launched a new, affordable subscription plan to offer accessible, ad-free content for viewers who find the premium subscription expensive. This new subscription aims to provide ad-free viewing at a lower cost.

articles.title: Luxing a ‘new' word, but we've been doing it for 100 years
articles.summary: Electrolux launched its vacuum cleaner in New Zealand 100 years ago, initially marketed through demonstrations and advertisements emphasizing its small size and ease of use. The brand name became a generic verb, 'luxing', particularly in the South Island, signifying vacuum cleaning, showcasing the product's successful integration into the local language and culture. Lever Brothers also launched a campaign to persuade women that their nylons would last longer and be protected from laddering if they used Lux soap powder.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 officially shown off with a build tougher than titanium
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: OnePlus has unveiled the OnePlus 15, their next flagship phone, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 165Hz refresh rate display. The OnePlus 15 will come in a new "sand dune" color and features a chassis made from aerospace-grade nano-ceramic metal, said to be lighter and stronger than titanium, with improved heat dissipation. The phone is expected to launch in China in October, with a global release likely to follow.

articles.title: The Good And Bad News For Brands About Google's New AI Browser
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google Chrome has been updated with AI capabilities. This reimagining positions Chrome as an AI-enhanced browser. This change introduces it into the agentic era of browsers.

articles.title: American Standard marks 150 years of everyday moments with exclusive Wilcon raffle
articles.author: MBrand
articles.summary: American Standard is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the "American Standard 150 Raffle Promotion" at Wilcon branches, offering customers the chance to win prizes like a hybrid car, an electric vehicle, an e-bike, and American Standard products with every P10,000 purchase. The brand is also hosting a "Special Partners' Night" to unveil its refreshed brand claim, 'Life. Love. Home,' and its future vision to trade partners, architects, designers, and media.

articles.title: Top 10 NSFW AI Generator Platforms in 2025
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or updated NSFW AI Generators in 2025, including Dream Companion, Candy AI, and CrushOn AI. Dream Companion combines realistic NSFW AI images with uncensored chat and customization options, while Candy AI focuses on roleplay and CrushOn AI emphasizes character variety and roleplay options.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Flagship Phone Confirmed With World-First Unique Toughness
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OnePlus announced its next phone, featuring a ceramic coating designed to enhance durability. This suggests an update or new product in the OnePlus lineup focused on improved resilience.

articles.title: Netflix's Jay Kelly 'guaranteed' to win Hollywood star an Oscar - but not George Clooney
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Netflix released a new trailer for Jay Kelly.

articles.title: Mountain Dew to Launch New Soda Flavor
articles.author: Alia Shoaib
articles.summary: Mountain Dew, owned by PepsiCo, is launching a new soda flavor called Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda Dew, which combines Mountain Dew's signature citrus flavor with a creamy taste. This new product will be available in both regular and Zero Sugar versions and is scheduled to launch at the NACS trade show in October before a national rollout in 2026.

articles.title: Ahold Delhaize USA Introduces Edge, a New Proprietary Retail Media Ad Platform Built for Grocery Retail
articles.author: Ahold Delhaize Usa
articles.summary: Ahold Delhaize USA's retail media arm, AD Retail Media, will launch Edge, a proprietary advertising technology platform, in January 2026. Edge will power on-site display, sponsored search, and in-store digital screens, offering CPG partners a transparent way to optimize ad performance across physical and digital channels. The platform aims to consolidate core retail media capabilities and enable a frictionless omnichannel experience.

articles.title: Ahold Delhaize USA Introduces Edge, a New Proprietary Retail Media Ad Platform Built for ...
articles.author: Ahold Delhaize USA
articles.summary: Ahold Delhaize USA, through its retail media arm AD Retail Media, will launch Edge, a new proprietary advertising technology platform in January 2026. Edge, designed for the grocery sector, will power on-site display, sponsored search, and in-store digital screens. This platform provides consumer-packaged goods (CPG) partners with a transparent and measurable way to optimize ad performance across both physical and digital channels.

articles.title: SwitchBot Officially Launches the SwitchBot Smart Video Doorbell
articles.author: Switch Bot
articles.summary: SwitchBot launched the SwitchBot Smart Video Doorbell. This product is designed to enhance home entry security, accessibility, and connectivity. The device includes a camera doorbell, an ultra-large indoor monitor, and features extended battery life.

articles.title: Stiller's Soda Review: A Near-Perfect 10 From Ben
articles.author: Michael Palan
articles.summary: Ben Stiller launched a new soda line called "Stiller's Soda" through his company, Stiller's Beverage Company. The soda line includes three flavors: Shirley Temple, Root Beer, and Lemon-Lime, all containing natural ingredients and being low in calories. These sodas are currently available for purchase in the New York City and Tri-State area as well as through Amazon.

articles.title: Shark hair dryer that 'dries hair is seconds' gets £45 discount ahead of Prime Day sale
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a limited-time deal on the Shark SpeedStyle Hair Dryer, reducing the price from £179.99 to £134.99. This hair dryer features scalp shield technology and comes with three attachments. Amazon is also selling the ghd Helios Professional Hair Dryer for £151.99, which delivers 30 percent more shine than older models.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Flagship Phone Confirmed With World-First Unique Toughness
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced details about its upcoming flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15. The phone will feature a ceramic coating, claimed to be more durable than aluminum or titanium. It will also be among the first devices to use Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip and will feature a new design called Sand Storm.

articles.title: Iconic Laundry Care Brand, Bounce, Unveils New Bounce Intense Dryer Sheets With Freshness That Lasts For Up To Four Weeks
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble's Bounce introduces Bounce Intense dryer sheets in September 2025. Bounce Intense delivers 10x the freshness of a leading base dryer sheet. It is available online at Amazon, Walmart.com and Kroger and it comes in 30-count for $5.49, and a 60-count for $9.99.

articles.title: Plunge Unveils All-In Gen 2: A New Standard for Excellence in Cold Water Therapy
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Plunge has launched the All-In Gen 2, an upgraded version of its cold plunge product, which features improved temperature control, enhanced hygiene, smarter automation, and stronger connectivity. The All-In Gen 2 integrates with the Plunge App, offering comprehensive session tracking and remote control capabilities.

articles.title: Plunge Unveils All-In Gen 2: A New Standard for Excellence in Cold Water Therapy
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Plunge launched the All-In Gen 2, a plug-and-plunge product, on September 29, 2025. This product aims to redefine the performance and overall experience in cold water immersion and it is an update of their original iteration in 2023.

articles.title: Flywl Introduces the First Universal SaaS Identifier Built for the Cloud Marketplace Ecosystem
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Flywl launched FUID (Flywl Unique ID), a standardized identifier for software products. This new service aims to bring clarity and speed to cloud marketplace discovery by providing a single, trusted identity for each listing.

articles.title: Get a look at the OnePlus 15 from every angle
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 globally, featuring a 'sand storm' color, a squircle camera island, and a customizable Plus Key instead of the Alert Slider. The phone is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and has a 165Hz refresh rate display. It also includes a fiberglass back and ceramic-coated metal frame.

articles.title: What Jake Shane Can't Live Without
articles.author: Jake Shane
articles.summary: Samsung partnered with Jake Shane to promote the Galaxy Z Fold7, highlighting its features like flex mode and the audio eraser. The campaign showcases the phone's capabilities, with Shane emphasizing the audio eraser's effectiveness in removing background noise from videos.

articles.title: Platinum Launches the 'Japan Entry PR Package' – Supporting Global Brands Enter the Japanese Market
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Platinum Inc. launched the 'Japan Entry PR Package,' a service designed to support global brands entering the Japanese market. The package provides comprehensive solutions from market entry strategy to execution, including targeted awareness, standard launch, and integrated marketing communications plans. These plans offer varying levels of support, including PR consulting, media relations, and advertising, tailored to different brand needs and market entry stages.

articles.title: Xiaomi 15T series: Chinese giant eyes bigger market share
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Xiaomi has globally launched its new 15T series smartphones, positioned as affordable flagship devices. The company also introduced a lineup of smart home appliances under the Mijia brand.

articles.title: Blazeo Launches Hybrid Voice AI, Blending Automation and Human Agents to Redefine Call Centers
articles.author: Blazeo Inc
articles.summary: Blazeo Inc. launched Blazeo Voice AI on September 29, 2025, a hybrid call center solution combining conversational AI and live human agents. This product offers instant responsiveness, scalability, and human empathy for complex conversations.

articles.title: Deepinder Goyal\u0026#039;s BIG move as he announces \u0026#039;Healthy Mode\u0026#039; on Zomato, says, \u0026#039;Every dish in this...\u0026#039;
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: Zomato introduces a new feature to assist users in discovering and ordering nutritious food. This enhancement aims to improve the user experience by focusing on healthier dietary choices.

articles.title: TWSC Debuts at Indonesia Global Sources Exhibition with Innovative Storage Solutions for Consumer Electronics
articles.summary: TWSC debuted at the Indonesia Global Sources Exhibition, showcasing new consumer storage products like PCIe 5.0 SSDs, DDR5 modules, ultra-high-capacity microSD cards, and high-speed portable PSSDs tailored for Southeast Asian customers. These products enhance capacity, speed, and reliability to address the increasing demands of consumer electronics applications.

articles.title: TWSC Debuts at Indonesia Global Sources Exhibition with Innovative Storage Solutions for Consumer Electronics
articles.summary: TWSC debuted at the Indonesia Global Sources Exhibition, showcasing new consumer storage products like PCIe 5.0 SSDs, DDR5 modules, microSD cards, and portable PSSDs. Plasmatreat GmbH promotes its Openair-Plasma process for surface pretreatment of materials like plastic, metal, and glass.

articles.title: Vijayawada Entrepreneurs Set to Launch AI-Integrated Classifieds App 'IND Classifieds'
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: IND Classifieds, founded by Kakumanu Ravi Chandra and co-founded by Bollineni V Narendra, is launching an AI-powered classifieds platform in India. The platform aims to address issues like fraudulent postings and irrelevant results by using AI for fraud detection, real-time verification, and intelligent matchmaking, with the official launch expected soon.

articles.title: Shoppers praise handy gadget that makes Vinted clothes ‘look brand new'
articles.author: JOE
articles.summary: Philips 1000 Series Fabric Shaver is being offered at a discounted price of €25.21 on Amazon. The product is designed to remove pills, lint, and fuzz from garments and other fabric items, effectively rejuvenating them. Customers have reported positive experiences using it on clothing, headboards, and other items, making them look brand new.

articles.title: Zuper Launches Zuper for Roofing, the AI Operating System Transforming One of North America's Largest Trades
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zuper launched Zuper for Roofing, an AI-native field service management software designed for roofing companies. This all-in-one solution aims to enhance profitability, increase job acquisition, and facilitate scalable growth by consolidating multiple tools into a single, connected system.

articles.title: You Might Be Surprised To Find These Under-$10 Hidden Gems At Amazon
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Amazon is featuring affordable goods, including some under $10, on its Haul page. Products highlighted are a shoe cleaner, wool dryer balls, a ten-pack of socks, and an eye brightening stick. These items are positioned as similar to Amazon's bestsellers.

articles.title: Official Look at the Nike Air Max 95 OG 'Solar Red'
articles.summary: Nike is re-releasing the Air Max 95 OG 'Solar Red' sneaker on October 10, 2025, for $190 USD. The shoe features a black midsole and outsole, signature wavy side panels in a grey gradient, and 'Solar Red' accents on the eyelets, tongue branding, and Air units.

articles.title: Save Big During Navratri – Up to 50% Off on Whirlpool, Samsung, and LG Washing Machines
articles.author: Varun Keval
articles.summary: Bajaj Finserv is launching 'Blockbuster EMI Days' from September 15th to October 31st, 2025, offering discounts up to 50% and EMIs starting at Rs. 833/month on washing machines from brands like Whirlpool, LG, and Samsung. The promotion includes zero down payment options and is available at over 1.5 lakh partner stores across 4,000+ cities.

articles.title: Co-op boosts foodservice presence with the launch of second ‘on the go' micro store
articles.author: Alice Leader
articles.summary: Co-op has launched its second 'on the go' concept store in Altrincham, featuring a focus on food and drink to-go. The store includes new product development like all-day breakfast meal pots and a deli selection, offering online home delivery and online trading after 7 pm through partners like Just Eat, Deliveroo, and Uber Eats. Co-op plans to open 15 more stores in the coming months and several hundred within the next two to three years.

articles.title: Arabica Coffee Tree
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Supply offers the Single Edge Max Razor, designed for minimal environmental impact. The razor features a small blade system, a durable aluminum and zinc build for easy recycling, and comes with eight refill blades and a wall mount. Its key features is great performance and design, with a lower environmental impact.

articles.title: Nissan C-SUV To Unveil On October 7; Here's What We Know So Far
articles.author: Akarsh Anant
articles.summary: Nissan is preparing to unveil its new C-segment SUV in India on October 7th. The SUV is expected to have features such as a rectangular grille, LED DRLs, integrated door handles, and a three-spoke steering wheel. The vehicle anticipates competing with models such as Hyundai Creta and Kia Seltos.

articles.title: Best Amazon Lipsticks To Use To Have Bold, Smooth and Long Lasting Color
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Lakme introduces Forever Matte Lipstick with rose oil extracts. Sugar Cosmetics launches Glide Lipstick with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E. Swiss Beauty presents Pure Lustre Lipstick containing olive oil and vitamin E for a high gloss finish. Dream Beauty unveils Intuition Lipstick, a creamy matte lipstick designed for everyday wear.

articles.title: 36 Genius Problem-Solving Products For Fall
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The article features various new products including a sunrise-simulating alarm clock, an electric mug warmer (including the Ember temperature control ceramic mug), silicone heel protectors, a vegan snout soother stick for dogs, a dog paw cleaning device, and a Levoit air purifier.  These products are designed to improve everyday life, offering solutions for morning routines, temperature control, comfort, pet care, and air purification.

articles.title: Kii Naturals Launches Bold New Look and Expands with First to Market Organic Double-Baked Artisan Crisp Line
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NuStef Baking announces the launch of Kii Naturals' new brand design and packaging. Kii Naturals also debuts its certified Organic double-baked artisan crisp.

articles.title: Sandisk Launches Creator Series Storage Devices in India: Price, Details
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: SanDisk introduced its Creator Series storage lineup in India on Monday. The new range features microSD and SD UHS-II cards, high-speed USB-C drives, and a MagSafe-compatible SSD. This lineup is specifically aimed at content creators.

articles.title: Why brands are re-embracing the power of the tagline
articles.author: William Rauscher
articles.summary: Tag Heuer's new CEO relaunched the brand in its sports territory with 'Designed to Win'. Ford launched its first global marketing effort in 15 years with 'Ready Set Ford', and Carrier evolved its brand with 'For the world we share.' Nike evolved 'Just Do It' into 'Why Do It' to address a new generation of athletes.

articles.title: Zomato launches 'Healthy Mode' feature to help users order nutritious food
articles.author: Press Trust
articles.summary: Zomato has launched 'Healthy Mode,' a new feature on its food delivery app that allows users to discover and order nutritious food. The feature, currently available in Gurugram with plans for expansion, utilizes AI and Large Language Models to provide macronutrient profiles and a 'Healthy Score' for dishes.

articles.title: 31 Things To Snag From Amazon's Internet Famous Section
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: E.l.f introduces Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, offering volume without smearing. Lottabody launches Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse to enhance curls and tame frizz. La Roche-Posay presents Anthelios SPF 40 Tinted Sunscreen with a lightweight formula, while Monday Haircare debuts Dry Shampoo for oily hair refresh. Jergens releases Natural Glow Firming Self-Tanner Body Lotion for a gradual sun-kissed glow. Garnier introduces Fructis Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum for shiny, frizz-free hair. Medicube launches 'Zero Pore' Pads to reduce pores and exfoliate skin. Neutrogena introduces Exfoliating Healthy Scalp Clarifying Shampoo for scalp buildup removal. Sol de Janeiro launches Bom Dia Brightening Cream with vitamin C and AHAs. Makup introduces Brow Me with a hybrid wax and gel formula. Flairisol presents Olivia, a continuous oil sprayer for home cooking. Eqqualberry launches Bakuchiol Plumping Serum for plumper skin and Vitamin Illuminating Serum to hydrate the skin and help visibly improve the appearance of dark spots.

articles.title: Snag These 31 Things From Amazon's Internet Famous Section Before They're Out Of Stock
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Bounce Curl specializes in curl brushes. La Jolie offers candles in various scents and sizes. E.l.f. has a tubing mascara available in multiple shades. Attitude Oceanly provides tinted sunscreen. Monday offers dry shampoo. Makup Beauty features brow gel, and a new oil sprayer with a glass bottle is available.

articles.title: A New Shower Safety Standard for Filipino Homes: Candy Launches Dart Series Water Heater, Tailored for the Tropics
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Candy, an Italian home appliance brand, launched the Dart Series instant water heater in the Philippines. This product is designed for tropical climates and features 11 layers of safety protection, including patented Shock Proof Technology. The Dart Series is available for purchase on Shopee, with special discounts offered during the 10.10 Mega Sale and on exclusive livestreams.

articles.title: A New Shower Safety Standard for Filipino Homes: Candy Launches Dart Series Water Heater, Tailored for the Tropics
articles.summary: Candy, a global home appliance brand, launched the Candy Dart Series, its first instant water heater designed for tropical environments, in the Philippines. The Dart Series features safety protections and Shock Proof Technology. The Candy Dart Electric Instant Water Heater is available on Shopee.

articles.title: Mastering new mirrorless camera technology: Photo Shoot
articles.author: Steve Heaslip
articles.summary: The CCT photographers received new mirrorless cameras with advanced features. These cameras include a super-long zoom lens (200-600mm) and autofocus software with eye detection for humans, animals, and birds, allowing users to choose which eye to focus on.

articles.title: Friends Don't Let Friends Not Know About These 53 Cheap Swaps For More Expensive Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights several new or existing product launches and compares them to higher-end alternatives.  E.l.f. launched Sheer For It Blush Tint as a cheaper alternative to Benetint, and Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara for thin lashes. Hawaiian Tropic introduced SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush for scalp protection. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil to hydrate, tighten, and gently exfoliate your skin.

articles.title: New Toyota FJ Cruiser: Exterior leaked
articles.author: Print Content
articles.summary: Toyota has filed a patent for a design believed to be the new FJ Cruiser, a compact SUV. The design, previewed in 2023, showcases a boxy, utilitarian SUV with off-road-focused features like large wheel arches and a tailgate-mounted spare wheel, resembling the previous-generation FJ Cruiser.

articles.title: Debenhams launches British fashion labels in US through department stores
articles.author: Holly Williams
articles.summary: Macy's launched Nasty Gal on its website after a dedicated marketing campaign in August, resulting in 'encouraging' early signs. Bloomingdale's and Nordstrom also saw 'immediate customer engagement across the group's portfolio'.

articles.title: Need storage? Have electronics to sell? Try these new NJ businesses
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Jersey Storage opened a climate-controlled storage unit facility in Jersey City on September 18. PayMore, a business where customers can sell used electronics, opened in Paramus. Super Fresh, a grocery store, had its grand opening in Woodland Park on September 13.

articles.title: Greggs introduces brand-new service at several UK stores
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Greggs has launched a new self-service screen initiative across a number of UK stores, allowing customers to browse the menu, order, and pay via touch screen. This trial aims to revolutionize the baked goods purchasing experience, with up to 10 locations in the North East already featuring the technology. In addition to this service Greggs opened a new Greggs pub named The Golden Flake Tavern on September 27.

articles.title: Greggs opens new bakery at Anglesey service station
articles.author: Owen Hughes
articles.summary: Greggs has launched a new store at Herron Services on Anglesey, creating 12 new jobs. The store offers a range of Greggs products, including savouries, hot drinks, hot food, and healthier choices, available for takeaway, sit-in, or Click + Collect.

articles.title: 10 smart inverter fully automatic washing machines for laundry care at home: Top picks with advanced features and more
articles.summary: The article showcases several new washing machines from companies such as LG, Samsung, Bosch, Panasonic, IFB, Haier, and Godrej. These models feature advanced technologies like AI-powered washing, steam cleaning, and inverter technology for energy efficiency. The article discusses their features, specifications, and unique selling points.

articles.title: Rejuran Turnover: DNA-Inspired Daily Skincare
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Rejuran introduces Turnover Ampoule, a cosmetic skincare product designed to support skin hydration and maintain a refreshed appearance. The ampoule features PDRN, a marine-derived ingredient, and is available at selected stockists. The product is intended for topical use and promotes a luminous, well-rested look.

articles.title: SanDisk launches Creator series MagSafe SSD for iPhone, microSD cards and more in India
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched its Creator Series in India, a set of professional-grade storage products. The series includes a MagSafe-compatible SSD for iPhones supporting ProRes 4K recording, microSD and SD UHS-II cards for mobile and professional photography, a USB-C flash drive, and a dual-connector phone drive for cross-platform compatibility.

articles.title: Sandisk® Introduces Creator Series in India to Empower Content Creators
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: Sandisk has launched its Creator Series in India, a professional-grade range of storage solutions. The series includes a microSD card, SD UHS-II Card, USB-C flash drives, a MagSafe-compatible SSD for iPhone, and a Phone Drive, all designed for content creators. Each product caters to specific needs, from high-resolution video recording to fast file transfers and device compatibility, with prices starting from Rs 1,809 to Rs 10,999, available on Amazon and Flipkart.

articles.title: EZVIZ is ready to make its mark at GITEX 2025, showcasing its latest AI-powered smart home innovations with an engaging brand experience hall to captivate tech enthusiasts and industry partners
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: EZVIZ will introduce its latest AI-powered smart home innovations at GITEX 2025, including next-generation smart cameras with interchangeable 4G and Wi-Fi connectivity and an expanded Smart Entry portfolio that features flagship smart locks, advanced video doorphones, and an all-new smart sliding gate opener. The showcase demonstrates EZVIZ's vision of 'Automate Imaginations for Homes' with the company's AI-driven products working as a cohesive ecosystem.

articles.title: Meet the ECOVACS DEEBOT X11 OmniCyclone: The smartest robot vacuum and mop you'll ever own
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: ECOVACS has launched the DEEBOT X11 OmniCyclone in Australia, a robot vacuum and mop featuring 19,500Pa suction, OZMO Roller 2.0 mop, and a bagless OmniCyclone station for automatic dust emptying and mop washing. The DEEBOT X11 utilizes TruePass climbing system and AIVI 3D obstacle avoidance for navigation and is available for $2,768.83 on Amazon Australia.

articles.title: 28 Sensible Walmart Products Anyone In Their 30s Should Own Already
articles.author: Lucia Peters
articles.summary: The article highlights the availability of new products across various categories. Hanes offers period-friendly underwear, E.l.f. introduces the Holy Hydration! facial moisturizer, and Cetaphil has a mineral-based sunscreen. JLabs presents noise-canceling headphones for immersive sound experiences.

articles.title: Amazon Great Indian Festival: Shop Best Watches for Men
articles.summary: A collection of new watches is available for purchase, including a modern multi-functional square dial watch with a silicon band, a black dial round-shaped analog watch, a stylish luminous waterproof chronograph wristwatch, a classic analog watch with a brown dial and leather strap, a sleek minimalist wristwatch, and a green dial olive leather strap workwear watch.

articles.title: Amazon's Best Foundations for Flawless Skin
articles.summary: Amazon offers several new foundation products. These include a high-coverage liquid foundation with SPF 50, a dewy-matte foundation for breathable coverage, a 4-in-1 blurring skin tint, and a tinted serum foundation providing 24-hour wear. IDPL provides up-to-date information about products and may receive a commission from sales.

articles.title: ‘Not so much a doormat as a boot scraper': Shreddies versus own-label malted wheats, tried and tasted
articles.author: Xanthe Clay
articles.summary: Shreddies breakfast cereal was launched in Ontario in 1939. Supermarkets like Morrisons, Asda, M&S, and Tesco offer versions of the cereal, with Asda and Tesco being the cheapest. Nestle, the owner of Shreddies, doesn't manufacture the cereal for anyone else.

articles.title: 30 Kinda Embarrassing Products To Buy Online Discreetly
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The content introduces a range of personal care products, including Kerasal fungal nail renewal formula for improving nail appearance, a deodorizer shoe spray for eliminating odors, Squatty Potty stool to aid in easier bowel movements, SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes for controlling excessive sweating, hemorrhoid cream for fast acting relief, and a travel-size Poo-Pourri to eliminate odors in public restrooms.

articles.title: Cheez-It is launching its biggest innovation in 3 years
articles.summary: Cheez-It is launching Cheez-It Crunch, its biggest innovation in three years. This new line features a 3D shape, an amplified crunch, and comes in three flavors: Kick'n Nacho Cheese, Zesty Jalapeno Cheddar, and Sharp White Cheddar.

articles.title: Pinterest announces new offerings
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Pinterest has launched new advertising solutions including Top of Search ads which appear in the top ten search results and Related Pins. They also introduced local inventory ads which display real-time prices for in-stock items and Pinterest Media Network Connect, a tool within Pinterest Ads Manager enabling media networks to securely share data.

articles.title: Canon Singapore Strengthens Gen Z ties with "#iamkyosei"
org: Photographic Society of National University of Singapore
articles.summary: Canon Singapore has launched a new campaign called '#iamkyosei' which celebrates Gen Z's creativity and drive towards positive societal change. This campaign is based on Canon's corporate philosophy of Kyosei, which means living and working together for the common good. As part of the campaign Canon Singapore has partnered with the Photographic Society of National University of Singapore (NUSPS) through its Montage 2025 photography event.

articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max review: Best camera yet with 8x zoom worth the upgrade
articles.author: Mark Furler
articles.summary: Apple has launched its new iPhone line-up, including the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max, starting at $1999 and $2199 respectively, featuring improved cameras, brighter displays, and better battery life. The lineup also includes the super thin and light iPhone Air and the basic iPhone 17 model starting at $1399. The new iPhones have a new aluminium unibody design and a faster A19 Pro chip.

articles.title: I removed mould from my washing machine drawer and drum with 1 product
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: Dettol has introduced the Dettol Antibacterial Washing Machine cleaner, a 5-in-1 product designed to kill bacteria, prevent bad odours, remove limescale and hidden dirt, and provide lasting freshness. Priced at around £4 a bottle, the cleaner can be used to clean the detergent drawer, glass door, rubber seal, and the drum of the washing machine.

articles.title: 용인특례시, 생성형 인공지능 통합 플랫폼 시범 도입
articles.summary: Yongin Special City is piloting a generative AI-based integrated platform service to improve administrative efficiency. The platform supports multiple AI services like GPT, Gemini, and Claude, enabling functions such as report writing and document summarization for employees. The project runs from September to March.

articles.title: No more worries about household chores! Roborock's four cleaning powerhouses deliver comprehensive protection for your home's cleanliness
articles.author: Eye
articles.summary: Roborock introduces a smart cleaning product designed to address common cleaning challenges such as pet paw prints, spills, and dust accumulation in hard-to-reach areas. This new product aims to simplify various cleaning scenarios.

articles.title: How to Use Your Phone to Make Life Better
articles.summary: iOS 26 introduces a new automatic language translation feature for text messages, FaceTime, and phone calls. Opal is a paid service that restricts access to certain apps during user-defined time windows, which helps to limit doom-scrolling.

articles.title: Dungeons and Dragons Reveals New Magic: The Gathering Mini-Supplement
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Dungeons and Dragons introduced Lorwyn: First Light, a new mini-expansion. This expansion includes new character options and monsters.

articles.title: SparrowGenie Releases AI-Powered RFP Generator: Draft Purchase RFPs 50% Faster
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: SparrowGenie launched a free, AI-powered RFP generator tool. This tool allows users to quickly create professional RFPs without requiring signup or payment.

articles.title: ADNOC Distribution unveils refreshed ‘Oasis by ADNOC' Brand
articles.author: Eye
articles.summary: ADNOC Distribution has re-launched its convenience store brand as 'Oasis by ADNOC'. The new brand, 'Oasis by ADNOC,' features a refreshed brand identity and a premium 'On-the-Gourmet' concept designed to enhance customer experience.

articles.title: Shark hair dryer that 'dries hair is seconds' gets £45 discount ahead of Prime Day sale
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A new lightweight yet powerful hair dryer is available, exceeding the performance of GHD hair dryers.

articles.title: Best early Black Friday deals at Space NK: Augustinus Bader, Rare Beauty, Laneige and more
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Space NK is offering early Black Friday deals. These deals include bargains on beauty products, ranging from cult serums to luxury fragrances.

articles.title: Find Formulation Success with Fiber
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Fibersol delivers prebiotic and sugar reduction benefits for trending products. This positions Fibersol as a product aimed at enhancing food and beverage formulations.

articles.title: Google's gradient ‘G' logo is rolling out everywhere
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new company-wide logo featuring a gradient 'G'. The new design, initially seen on the Google app for Android and iOS in May, will be rolled out across the company.

articles.title: Early October Prime Day Robot Vacuum Deals: Sweep Up These Savings on Top Models
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roomba and Eufy are offering deals on their products in anticipation of Prime Day.

articles.title: Gelatoro opens second location in far Northwest Austin
articles.author: Katlynn Fox
articles.summary: Gelatoro opened a second location in far Northwest Austin on Sept. 1. This expansion comes two years after the launch of their first store in the Hyde Park neighborhood.
